verses.verse: How <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> are thy <S%H6471>feet<s%> in <S%H5275>sandals<s%>, O <S%H5081>prince<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>! Thy <S%H2542>rounded<s%> <S%H3409>thighs<s%> are like <S%H2481>jewels<s%>, The <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a skilful <S%H542>workman<s%>.

Thy <S%H8326>body<s%> is like a <S%H5469>round<s%> <S%H101>goblet<s%>, Wherein no <S%H2637>mingled<s%> <S%H4197>wine<s%> is <S%H990>wanting<s%>: Thy waist is like a <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> Set <S%H5473>about<s%> with <S%H7799>lilies<s%>.
Thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are like two8147, Joshua82 <S%H6646>fawns<s%> That are twins of a <S%H8380>roe<s%>.

Thy <S%H6677>neck<s%> is like the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%>; Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as the <S%H1295>pools<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, By the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1337>Bath-rabbim<s%>; Thy <S%H639>nose<s%> is like the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> Which <S%H6822>looketh<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>.

Thy <S%H7218>head<s%> upon thee is like <S%H3760>Carmel<s%>, And the <S%H1803>hair<s%> of thy <S%H7218>head<s%> like <S%H713>purple<s%>; The <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H631>held<s%> captive in the tresses <S%H7298>thereof<s%>.
How <S%H3302>fair<s%> and how <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> art <S%H160>thou<s%>, O love, for <S%H8588>delights<s%>!
This thy <S%H6967>stature<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> to a <S%H8558>palm-tree<s%>, And thy <S%H7699>breasts<s%> to its <S%H811>clusters<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will climb <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H8558>palm-tree<s%>, I will take <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H5577>branches<s%> <S%H7699>thereof<s%>: Let thy breasts be as <S%H811>clusters<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, And the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of thy <S%H639>breath<s%> like <S%H8598>apples<s%>,

And thy <S%H2441>mouth<s%> like the <S%H2896>best<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>, That <S%H1980>goeth<s%> down <S%H4339>smoothly<s%> for my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, <S%H1680>Gliding<s%> through the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those that are <S%H3463>asleep<s%>.
I am my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>'s; And his desire is toward <S%H8669>me<s%>.
Come <S%H3212><s%>, my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, let us go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>; Let us <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H3723>villages<s%>.

Let us get up <S%H7925>early<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; Let us <S%H7200>see<s%> whether the <S%H1612>vine<s%> hath <S%H6524>budded<s%>, And its <S%H6524>blossom<s%> is <S%H6605>open<s%>, And the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> are in <S%H5132>flower<s%>: There will I <S%H5414>give<s%> thee my <S%H1730>love<s%>.

The <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> forth <S%H7381>fragrance<s%>; And at our <S%H6607>doors<s%> are all manner of <S%H4022>precious<s%> <S%H2319>fruits<s%>, new and <S%H3465>old<s%>, Which I have laid <S%H6845>up<s%> for <S%H1730>thee<s%>, O my beloved.
